item.title: Glossary of Socialist Terms
item.description: Glossary of Socialist Terms Notes: Try to keep each term to 3 sentences max. Keep the definitions as simple as possible, ~ELI 10 years old. Terms Term Definition Capitalism A system that allows private individuals to own the means of production, with the goal of extracting a profit from the sale of commodities produced by wage workers. Profit / Surplus Value The difference between the value a worker adds, and the value that they receive (such as a wage) and are able to use for themselves.
